mapper.select: SELECT h.pfdno, h.bno, h.email, h.pfdresult, h.pfdreg_date, CASE when d.dno then d.dname ELSE '부서 미지정' END AS 'department', CASE when t.tno then t.tname ELSE '팀 미지정' END AS 'team' FROM pfd h LEFT OUTER JOIN board b ON h.bno = b.bno LEFT OUTER JOIN department d ON b.dno = d.dno LEFT OUTER JOIN team t ON b.tno = t.tno ORDER BY h.pfdno DESC;
SELECT MONTH(pfdreg_date) no, count(pfdresult) count FROM pfd WHERE pfdresult > 0 AND YEAR(pfdreg_date) = YEAR(NOW()) GROUP BY MONTH(pfdreg_date);
select * from block order by blockdate desc

SELECT MAX(l.blno) blno, m.email email, m.islock islock, MAX(l.blockdate) blockdate FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN block l ON m.email = l.email WHERE m.islock = 1 GROUP BY m.email ORDER BY l.blno DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET islock = 0 WHERE email = #{email};
mapper.select: SELECT MONTH(blockdate) no, COUNT(blockdate) count FROM block WHERE YEAR(blockdate) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY MONTH(blockdate) DESC;
